title: Draft an M&A Deal Announcement
description: After an M&A deal is signed, an in-house counsel needs to draft an internal announcement to all employees.

tasks.description: Review the approved press release for the key messaging.
Draft an internal email that announces the transaction, expresses excitement for the future, and provides high-level information about the integration process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear and positive internal communication.

tasks.description: Route the draft announcement to HR and senior leadership for review and approval before sending.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the correct internal review process.
